template.name: Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2
template.description: Template Server iDRAC version: 0.15 Overview: for Dell servers with iDRAC controllers http://www.dell.com/support/manuals/us/en/19/dell-openmanage-server-administrator-v8.3/snmp_idrac8/idrac-mib?guid=guid-e686536d-bc8e-4e09-8e8b-de8eb052efee Supported systems: http://www.dell.com/support/manuals/us/en/04/dell-openmanage-server-administrator-v8.3/snmp_idrac8/supported-systems?guid=guid-f72b75ba-e686-4e8a-b8c5-ca11c7c21381 MIBs used: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2

item.name: Overall system health status
item.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 This attribute defines the overall rollup status of all components in the system being monitored by the remote access card. Includes system, storage, IO devices, iDRAC, CPU, memory, etc.

item.name: Hardware model name
item.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 This attribute defines the model name of the system.

item.name: Operating system
item.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 This attribute defines the name of the operating system that the hostis running.

item.name: Hardware serial number
item.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 This attribute defines the service tag of the system.

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 This attribute defines the firmware version of a remote access card.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature CPU Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Probe Table IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2::temperatureProbeTable

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 0700.0020.0001.0006 This attribute defines the reading for a temperature probe of type other than temperatureProbeTypeIsDiscrete. When the value for temperatureProbeType is other than temperatureProbeTypeIsDiscrete,the value returned for this attribute is the temperature that the probeis reading in tenths of degrees Centigrade. When the value for temperatureProbeType is temperatureProbeTypeIsDiscrete, a value is not returned for this attribute.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 0700.0020.0001.0005 This attribute defines the probe status of the temperature probe.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is too low: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Ambient Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Probe Table IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2::temperatureProbeTable

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 0700.0020.0001.0006 This attribute defines the reading for a temperature probe of type other than temperatureProbeTypeIsDiscrete. When the value for temperatureProbeType is other than temperatureProbeTypeIsDiscrete,the value returned for this attribute is the temperature that the probeis reading in tenths of degrees Centigrade. When the value for temperatureProbeType is temperatureProbeTypeIsDiscrete, a value is not returned for this attribute.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 0700.0020.0001.0005 This attribute defines the probe status of the temperature probe.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCALE}: Temperature is too low: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

item_prototype.name: {#PSU_DESCR}: Power supply status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 0600.0012.0001.0005 This attribute defines the status of the power supply.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.psu.status[powerSupplyStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$PSU_CRIT_STATUS:"critical"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.psu.status[powerSupplyStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$PSU_CRIT_STATUS:"nonRecoverable"},eq)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {#PSU_DESCR}: Power supply is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

trigger_prototype.name: {#PSU_DESCR}: Power supply is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

dependency.name: {#PSU_DESCR}: Power supply is in critical state
dependency.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.psu.status[powerSupplyStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$PSU_CRIT_STATUS:"critical"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.psu.status[powerSupplyStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$PSU_CRIT_STATUS:"nonRecoverable"},eq)}=1

item_prototype.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 0700.0012.0001.0005 This attribute defines the probe status of the cooling device.

item_prototype.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan speed
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 0700.0012.0001.0006 This attribute defines the reading for a cooling device of subtype other than coolingDeviceSubTypeIsDiscrete. When the value for coolingDeviceSubType is other than coolingDeviceSubTypeIsDiscrete, the value returned for this attribute is the speed in RPM or the OFF/ON value of the cooling device. When the value for coolingDeviceSubType is coolingDeviceSubTypeIsDiscrete, a value is not returned for this attribute.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"criticalUpper"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"nonRecoverableUpper"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"criticalLower"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"nonRecoverableLower"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"failed"},eq)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_WARN_STATUS:"nonCriticalUpper"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_WARN_STATUS:"nonCriticalLower"},eq)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

dependency.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan is in critical state
dependency.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"criticalUpper"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"nonRecoverableUpper"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"criticalLower"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"nonRecoverableLower"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:sensor.fan.status[coolingDeviceStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$FAN_CRIT_STATUS:"failed"},eq)}=1

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The status of the physical disk itself without the propagation of any contained component status. Possible values: 1: Other 2: Unknown 3: OK 4: Non-critical 5: Critical 6: Non-recoverable

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk serial number
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The physical disk's unique identification number from the manufacturer.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk S.M.A.R.T. status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 Indicates whether the physical disk has received a predictive failure alert.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk model name
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The model number of the physical disk.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk part number
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The part number of the disk.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk media type
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The media type of the physical disk. Possible Values: 1: The media type could not be determined. 2: Hard Disk Drive (HDD). 3: Solid State Drive (SSD).

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Disk size
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The size of the physical disk in megabytes.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.status[physicalDiskComponentStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$DISK_FAIL_STATUS:"critical"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.status[physicalDiskComponentStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$DISK_FAIL_STATUS:"nonRecoverable"},eq)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk failed
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check physical disk for warnings or errors

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check physical disk for warnings or errors

dependency.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk failed
dependency.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.status[physicalDiskComponentStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$DISK_FAIL_STATUS:"critical"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.status[physicalDiskComponentStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$DISK_FAIL_STATUS:"nonRecoverable"},eq)}=1

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.serialnumber[physicalDiskSerialNo.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1 and {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.serialnumber[physicalDiskSerialNo.{#SNMPINDEX}].strlen()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Disk has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Disk serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk S.M.A.R.T. failed
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Disk probably requires replacement.

dependency.name: {#DISK_NAME}: Physical disk failed
dependency.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.status[physicalDiskComponentStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$DISK_FAIL_STATUS:"critical"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.status[physicalDiskComponentStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$DISK_FAIL_STATUS:"nonRecoverable"},eq)}=1

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Layout type
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The virtual disk's RAID type. Possible values: 1: Not one of the following 2: RAID-0 3: RAID-1 4: RAID-5 5: RAID-6 6: RAID-10 7: RAID-50 8: RAID-60 9: Concatenated RAID 1 10: Concatenated RAID 5

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Current state
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The state of the virtual disk when there are progressive operations ongoing. Possible values: 1: There is no active operation running. 2: The virtual disk configuration has changed. The physical disks included in the virtual disk are being modified to support the new configuration. 3: A Consistency Check (CC) is being performed on the virtual disk. 4: The virtual disk is being initialized. 5: BackGround Initialization (BGI) is being performed on the virtual disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Read policy
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The read policy used by the controller for read operations on this virtual disk. Possible values: 1: No Read Ahead. 2: Read Ahead. 3: Adaptive Read Ahead.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Write policy
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The write policy used by the controller for write operations on this virtual disk. Possible values: 1: Write Through. 2: Write Back. 3: Force Write Back.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Disk size
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The size of the virtual disk in megabytes.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The current state of this virtual disk (which includes any member physical disks.) Possible states: 1: The current state could not be determined. 2: The virtual disk is operating normally or optimally. 3: The virtual disk has encountered a failure. The data on disk is lost or is about to be lost. 4: The virtual disk encounterd a failure with one or all of the constituent redundant physical disks. The data on the virtual disk might no longer be fault tolerant.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Virtual disk failed
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check virtual disk for warnings or errors

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPVALUE}({#DISK_NAME}): Virtual disk is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check virtual disk for warnings or errors

item_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The status of the controller itself without the propagation of any contained component status. Possible values: 1: Other 2: Unknown 3: OK 4: Non-critical 5: Critical 6: Non-recoverable

item_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller model
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 The controller's name as represented in Storage Management.

trigger_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller is in unrecoverable state!
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

trigger_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

dependency.name: {#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller is in unrecoverable state!

trigger_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

dependency.name: {#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller is in critical state
{#CNTLR_NAME}: Disk array controller is in unrecoverable state!

item_prototype.name: Battery {#BATTERY_NUM}: Disk array cache controller battery status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 Current state of battery. Possible values: 1: The current state could not be determined. 2: The battery is operating normally. 3: The battery has failed and needs to be replaced. 4: The battery temperature is high or charge level is depleting. 5: The battery is missing or not detected. 6: The battery is undergoing the re-charge phase. 7: The battery voltage or charge level is below the threshold.

trigger_prototype.name: Battery {#BATTERY_NUM}: Disk array cache controller battery is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

dependency.name: Battery {#BATTERY_NUM}: Disk array cache controller battery is in critical state!

trigger_prototype.name: Battery {#BATTERY_NUM}: Disk array cache controller battery is not in optimal state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

dependency.name: Battery {#BATTERY_NUM}: Disk array cache controller battery is in critical state!
Battery {#BATTERY_NUM}: Disk array cache controller battery is in warning state

trigger_prototype.name: Battery {#BATTERY_NUM}: Disk array cache controller battery is in critical state!
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

trigger.name: System is in unrecoverable state!
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

trigger.name: System status is in critical state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for errors

trigger.name: System status is in warning state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for warnings

dependency.name: System status is in critical state

trigger.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {Template Server Dell iDRAC SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close
